In the English books, these characters speak in reversed text (siht ekil). I’m not quite sure how it’s handled in Japanese.
Their text is written in katakana, which makes sense since that’s used for transcribing other languages. But reversing the katakana characters just produces more gibberish.
For now, I’m just going to pick some of there reversed lines from the book. “Fresh meat!” if you’re lazy.

Translated:
He wishes to join⏎
me。Let him come。

Japanese: じょうだんじゃない!⏎わたすものですか!
Google Translate: This is not a joke! ⏎Is this something you should give away?
Translated:
We will not!⏸
He would sacrifice⏎
himself for us、but⏸
we will not allow⏎
it!

Japanese: その男をよこせ!⏸さもないと おまえらを⏎みな殺しにするぞ!
Google Translate: Give me that man!⏸or I'll kill you all!
Translated:
Give him to me、or⏎
I will kill you!

Japanese: やるなら、やってみろ!
Google Translate: If you want to do it, do it!
Translated:
Then do it!⏸
But you will have to⏎
kill your companion⏸
too、for you are too⏎
large to take one⏸
of us without the⏎

Japanese: おろかなやつらめ!
おまえは――マナスのために――⏎命を投げ出すと言うのか⏸マナスは……おまえたちのために⏎命を投げ出そうとした⏸むかし――ずっとむかし⏎わたしにも、そんな事が――
Google Translate: Are you saying that you would give up your life for Manas? Manas was willing to give up his life for you. Once upon a time, a long time ago, it happened to me too. ―
Translated:
You… would die for⏎
him⏸
He… would die for⏎
you⏸
And all of you would⏎
give up…⏸
Everything… for your⏎
cause…⏸
I remember… a time⏎
when I、too…⏸
Long ago… So long⏎
ago…

Japanese: 何かが――わたしに――⏎おこりかけている――⏸心が――きよめられている――
Google Translate: Something is happening to me. My heart is being purified.
Translated:
Something… is…⏎
happening to me⏸
My heart… is being…⏎
purified

Japanese: (そうか、トパーズに こいつの⏎心が反応しているんだ!)
Google Translate: (I see, this guy's ⏎heart is reacting to Topaz!)

Japanese: さあ、もっていくがいい!
(ベルトが あつい)⏸(だからこれは⏎さがしている宝石だ)⏸(でも、ピンク色の⏎宝石なんてあったかな……)
Google Translate: (The belt is hot)⏸(So this is the jewel I'm looking for)⏸(But I wonder if there was a pink jewel...)

(The belt is hot、so⏎
this must be it)⏸
(But I don’t remember⏎
a pink gem…)

Japanese: どうした? 何がふまんだ?
いや、何でもない
Translated:
Nothing!⏸
I have the stone。We⏎
can go。

Japanese: (おちついて考えるんだ)⏸(そうだ、デルトラの書を思い出せ)

(Calm down and try⏎
to recall the book)

Japanese: いだいなるルビーは⏎こうふくのシンボル⏎⏎しかし じゃあくが近い時⏎その赤は 色あせる
Google Translate: The main ruby ​​is ⏎the symbol of Koufuku⏎⏎However, when the calf is near⏎ its red color fades.

symbol of happiness、⏎

Google Translate: (When the red fades, it becomes pink!)⏸(In other words, Ruby feels a dangerous presence!)

(When red pales、
what is it but pink?)

Japanese: みんな! 気をつけろ!
かくれるんだ!
ぼくたちが 岩のうしろに かくれた時⏎そのまじょは あらわれました。
Google Translate: When we hid behind a rock, the magic appeared.

right before⏎

Translated:

with hateful eyes、⏎

Google Translate: Tegan was looking for us. ⏎⏎I'm sure someday they'll find us...and try to take our lives.

⏎

Notes:
I think Lief might mean “what does that sound mean when I pick up an item?” or “what are these items that just go into my inventory?”
